          returns whether this Card and other Card have the same suit and rank
 boolean Card.hasSameRankAs(Card other)
          returns whether or not this Card and other Card have the same rank
 boolean Card.hasSameSuitAs(Card other)
          returns whether or not this Card and other Card have the same suit.
 boolean Card.isPredecessorOf(Card other)
          returns whether or not this Card's rank equals other Card's rank - 1
 boolean Card.isSameColour(Card other)
          returns whether this Card and other Card are both red or both black
 boolean Card.isSuccessorOf(Card other)
          returns whether or not this Card's rank equals other Card's rank + 1
 boolean Card.isSuitPredecessorOf(Card other)
          returns whether or not this Card is other Card's predecessor and both Cards have the same suit
 boolean Card.isSuitSuccessorOf(Card other)
          returns whether or not this Card is other Card's successor and both Cards have the same suit
